mapper.select: SELECT * FROM searchhistory AS s INNER JOIN member AS m ON s.searched_user_id = m.user_id WHERE s.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY s.last_search_date DESC LIMIT 0, 50;
SELECT * FROM member WHERE user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR nickname like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') LIMIT 0, 50;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (user_id, password, name, email, nickname, salt) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{salt});
